Description: We've added a new role-based permission to control access to OpenID Connect (OIDC) token requests for outbound API authentication.See More
Title: New Role-Based Permission for Requesting OpenID Connect Tokens for Outbound API Calls

Description: Alumni users can now log into SAP SuccessFactors using Identity Authentication to securely access company materials after leaving the company.See More
Title: Alumni Can Now Authenticate into SAP SuccessFactors Using Identity Authentication

Description: The Monitoring Tool now offers clearer migration status updates and improved guidance, helping administrators track and troubleshoot the Identity Authentication and Identity Provisioning migration process more effectively.See More
Title: Enhancements to Monitoring Tool for Identity Authentication and Identity Provisioning

Description: We’ve enhanced the Check Tool in SAP SuccessFactors to help customers proactively identify and resolve potential inconsistencies in Single Sign-On (SSO) settings.See More
Title: Enhancements to Single Sign-On Check in SAP SuccessFactors Check Tool

Description: We've supported HRIS elements in the DynamicGroup entity and its related function imports, but only with field values. Now, external codes for HRIS elements are also supported. Field values usually lack semantic meaning, while external codes do. For example, in the country field of job information, the field value might be 9211251, whereas its external code is USA. The function imports for DynamicGroup include getExpandedDynamicGroupById, getExpandedDynamicGroupByName, and getExpandedDynamicGroupByNameAndSubType.See More
Title: External Code Is Supported in DynamicGroup OData V2 APIs

Description: You can search for permission groups and synthetic groups using the System for Cross-domain Identity Management (SCIM) Groups APIs. Previously supported synthetic group types are the Common Data Model Content Deep-Link Access User Group and the Story Report Access User Group. Now, you can also search for the Mobile Access User Group.See More
Title: Mobile Access User Group Supported in Workforce SCIM Groups APIs

Description: You can now use the SCIM Users API to query and update the email addresses of new hires.See More
Title: Email Is Supported in Workforce SCIM Users APIs

Description: When transporting permission groups between tenants using the Configuration Transport Center admin tool, previously, permission group memberships were excluded. Now, you can choose to include static group memberships. A new override instruction, Exclude Static Group Membership, is added to the Transport: Override Export Instructions step.See More
Title: Include Static Group Membership in Configuration Transport Center

Description: Delegation now allows end users to customize their email notification settings. Users can choose to unsubscribe from Delegation email notifications in their personal settings.See More
Title: Unsubscribe from Delegation Email Notifications

Description: Previously, the system cleared global user IDs after an instance refresh. Now, you can choose to keep or remove them. A new option, Do not delete global user IDs, is available in the SAP SuccessFactors HCM suite's Specific Settings section of an instance refresh request.See More
Title: Retain Global User IDs in Instance Refresh

Description: As a Role-Based Permissions administrator, you can now refresh RBP model in Admin Center. A new job type, Refresh RBP Model, is available in Manage Scheduled Jobs.See More
Title: New Refresh RBP Model Job Type

Description: HTTP header X-SF-Correlation-Id will reach end of development on December 9, 2022 and will be deleted on May 15, 2026.See More
Title: Deprecation of HTTP Header X-SF-Correlation-Id

Description: We've set up time based filtering as default based on last run time for new integrations using COAPI as a source.See More

Title: Enhancements to Integration Center

Description: With the integration of SAP SuccessFactors and Microsoft 365, you can now customize default messaging experience for the SAP SuccessFactors app in Microsoft Teams, ensuring more relevant and consistent communication.See More

Description: It's easier for you to connect a SAP SuccessFactors system with a WalkMe system.See More

Description: You can now adjust your SAP SuccessFactors language settings directly in the mobile app for a smoother, more consistent experience.See More

Description: You can now export job lists in Scheduled Job Manager. A new Export button is now available under the Job Monitor and Job Scheduler tabs.See More
Title: Scheduled Job Manager Supports Exporting Job Data

Description: You can now edit the proficiency level name and descriptions of every proficiency level scale in the Attributes Library.See More
Title: Enhancements to Proficiency Level Name and Description Changes

Description: WalkMe offers new adoption capabilities for SAP SuccessFactors.See More
Title: WalkMe Adoption Capability

Description: The employee quickcard is Deleted as of May 16, 2025.See More
Title: Employee Quickcard Is Deleted

Description: We're migrating configurations from Set up Interview Scheduling Outlook Integration  page to Work Tech Configuration. The Set up Interview Scheduling Outlook Integration page will reach end of maintenance and will be deleted on November 14, 2025.See More

Description: We've enhanced the granting of permissions for the business rule MDF object. See More
Title: Enhanced Authorization Concept for Business Rules

Description: We introduced ten new home page quick actions to SAP SuccessFactors Work Zone.See More
Title: New Home Page Quick Actions Available in SAP SuccessFactors Work Zone

Description: You can now download comprehensive application data, including resumes, cover letters, and other attachments, as a single PDF or ZIP file.See More

This experience is built upon these core components: Guided Application Experience, My Applications, My Profile and Manage Account, each offering features that work together to optimize the candidate journey.See More
Title: The Reimagined Candidate Experience

Description: In Career Site Builder, you can now add an Upload Resume component to pages of your career site that enables job-seekers to upload a resume and find jobs that match their skills.See More
Title: Page Component for Uploading Resumes on Career Sites

Description: In Career Site Builder, you can now add a Similar Jobs component to the Job layout so that job-seekers can discover similar jobs to the one they're viewing.See More
Title: Similar Jobs Displayed on Career Sites

Description: In Career Site Builder, you can now choose to use a standard URL for your career site, with a generic SAP domain, so that you don't have to maintain the DNS and SSL certificates. See More

Description: The ability to configure colors and styles for the Google Job Map component in Career Site Builder is Deleted as of May 16, 2025.See More
Title: Google Map Styling in Career Site Builder Is Deleted

Description: We've provided many enhancements to help you adopt the standard Job Location object and the Unified Data Model for SAP SuccessFactors Recruiting.See More

Description: Validated job requisition skills are now automatically available in copied job requisitions.See More

Description: We've removed the Job Profile tab from the Job Requisition Details page.See More

Description: You can now enter more values in the salary fields of the job requisition.See More

Description: Operators like hiring managers and recruiters can now access relevant audit reports. See More
Title: Recruiting Story Reports Accessible by Operators

Description: In the SAP SuccessFactors web or mobile application, the actual recorded time of a time punch will be the user's local time that is based on the server time and not the device time.See More

Description: The Family Medical Leave Act (FMLA) is a labor law that allows covered employers to provide employees with unpaid leave for certain medical and family reasons. This feature is designed to integrate with third-party providers to automatically generate FMLA-related absences.See More

Description: On the Time Off UI, clock-time users can now select the first or second half of a day when creating an absence request without having to enter the start time and end times.See More

Description: We've made multiple usability enhancements to the My Calendar UI. See More
Title: Usability Enhancements in My Calendar UI

Description: We've made enhancements to Time Sheet Approval Center. These enhancements are Role-Based Permissions (RBP) related action links, key facts, and filters. See More
Title: Enhancements to Time Sheet Approval Center

Description: We've introduced a few enhancements related to the Time Statement Generation feature to improve the usability. See More
Title: Enhancements in Time Statement Generation

Description: Time Tracking users can now record time or apply planned working time for multiple days on the Time Sheet UI by using the new Quick Create experience.See More
Title: Quick Create on Time Sheet UI

Description: Using the Time Sheet Change Audit Document, system administrators can now review any updates made to a time sheet.See More
Title: Review Time Sheet Updates Using Time Sheet Change Audit Document

Description: We're introducing time containers that count specific events rather than aggregating timeSee More

Description: You can now use the valuation types Compare Threshold with Comparison Group to Route Input, Difference Between Threshold and Input, and Compare Threshold with Input Groups and Count Events to create time valuations with time containers.See More

Description: You can now set up time valuations for single record approval that ensure that only approved single records are processed by the time valuation. See More

Description: You can now configure single record approval for time sheets with flexible approval periods. We've also simplified the workflow of single record approvals, enhanced the handling of declined recordings, and added a cancellation workflow for approved time recordings.See More

Description: You can now create time records filters that check if the previous or next day is a non-working day. This feature helps you calculate premiums for night shifts that extend into non-working days.See More

Description: You can now configure time sheets with flexible approval periods. In addition to weekly and monthly time sheets, you can now define approval periods of 2 weeks, 4 weeks, and half a month. See More

Description: You can now configure time recording profiles with up to 10 daily time containers.See More
Title: More Daily Time Containers Allowed in Time Recording Profiles

Description: We've made changes to the time sheet submission process to ensure that a time sheet is blocked from submission when there are any unresolved discrepancies.See More
Title: Preventing Submission of Time Sheet with Errors

Description: Two use cases for Position Management are now available in Joule.See More
Title: New Use Cases Available in Joule - March 2025

Description: This deprecation announcement has been withdrawn. It was earlier planned that Pixel Perfect Talent Card (PPTC) will reach End of Maintenance on November 15, 2025 and will be Deleted on November 15, 2025.See More
Title: Deprecation of Pixel Perfect Talent Card (PPTC)

Description: The SOAP-based SFAPIs for Employee Central, except the CompoundEmployee API, will reach end of maintenance on May 17, 2024 and will be deleted on November 20, 2026.See More

Description: You can now clear stale to-do tasks and home page cards using the Quick Fix option in the new Onboarding check tools. See More

Description: We introduced SAP Build Process Automation (SBPA) templates to provide new wizard-like onboarding and crossboarding guided experiences for you to onboard employees in SAP SuccessFactors Work Zone.See More

Title: Deprecation of "Top Jobs" and "View All Jobs" Links on Career Sites

Description: We have introduced the Employee Waive Request MDF object to help you track benefit-waive requests made by employees in the latest benefit enrollment experience.See More

Description: Any attribute tags associated with a learning item now appear in the Included Attributes section on the Details screen.See More

Description: We've made some important changes to activation and authentication in the SAP SuccessFactors Mobile apps. These changes impact all iOS users and also users who share a device with multiple people or multiple user accounts.See More

Description: The Admin Center   Mobile Settings  Enable Mobile Features    Mobile Security  Screen Capture and Recording Restriction setting now proactively masks any attempted screenshots to protect sensitive information while keeping users informed. Mobile Settings > Enable Mobile Features > Mobile Security > Screen Capture and Recording Restriction setting now proactively masks any attempted screenshots to protect sensitive information while keeping users informed.">See More

Description: The legacy version of Goal Management will reach End of Maintenance on May 17, 2024 and will be Deleted on December 31, 2026.See More

Description: Based on the new conversational experience, we’ve introduced new use cases and upgraded more existing transactional cases. See More

Title: Assignment Offer Notification Card Available in Microsoft Teams

Description: The TriggerMatrixRelationSync field is deleted as of May 16, 2025.See More
Title: TriggerMatrixRelationSync Field is Deleted
